name: Gravity Goose
description:
When Gary the goose lost his wings, he thought his flying days were over... well guess again, Gary! Use the powers of the mythical Gravity Glove to weave your way through challenging obstacles, puzzles, and the occasional mutant cockroach in this highly-original rescue mission.

Gravity Goose gives you full control. This isn't your typical flip up and down gravity game! Not only can you manipulate the direction of gravity, but you also control the amount of gravity - fall faster, jump higher, leap further, walk on the floors, ceilings, and walls, or float through the air at zero Gs - it's all up to you!
